# System Text Json Docs

## Advanced

- [Customize character encoding](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json/character-encoding.md): Learn how to customize character encoding while serializing to and deserializing from JSON in .NET.
- [Write custom converters](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json/converters-how-to.md): Learn how to create custom converters for the JSON serialization classes that are provided in the System.Text.Json namespace.
- [Customize contracts](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json/custom-contracts.md): Learn how to write your own contract resolution logic to customize the JSON contract for a type.
- [Extract JSON schema](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json/extract-schema.md): Learn how to use the JsonSchemaExporter class to extract JSON schema documents from .NET types.

## Deserialize

- [How to deserialize](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json/deserialization.md): Learn how to use the System.Text.Json namespace to deserialize from JSON in .NET. Includes sample code.
- [Require JSON properties](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json/required-properties.md): Learn how to mark properties as required for deserialization to succeed.
- [Respect nullable annotations](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json/nullable-annotations.md): Learn how to configure serialization and deserialization to respect nullable annotations.
- [Allow invalid JSON](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json/invalid-json.md): Learn how to allow comments, trailing commas, and quoted numbers while serializing to and deserializing from JSON in .NET.
- [Handle unmapped members](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json/missing-members.md): Learn how to configure the JSON deserialization behavior when properties are present in the JSON payload that aren't present in the POCO type.
- [Handle overflow JSON, use JsonElement or JsonNode](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json/handle-overflow.md): Learn how to handle overflow JSON or use JsonElement or JsonNode while using System.Text.Json to serialize and deserialize JSON in .NET.
- [Deserialize to immutable types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json/immutability.md): Learn how to deserialize JSON to immutable types and properties in .NET.
- [Populate initialized properties](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json/populate-properties.md): Learn how to modify properties and fields that are already initialized when deserializing from JSON in .NET.

## How to

- [Migrate from Newtonsoft.Json](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json/migrate-from-newtonsoft.md): Learn about the differences between Newtonsoft.Json and System.Text.Json and how to migrate to System.Text.Json.
- [Instantiate JsonSerializerOptions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json/configure-options.md): Learn about constructors for JsonSerializerOptions instances and how to reuse JsonSerializerOptions instances.
- [Enable case-insensitive matching](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json/character-casing.md): Learn how to enable case-insensitive property name matching while serializing to and deserializing from JSON in .NET.
- [Handle references](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json/preserve-references.md): Learn how to preserve references and handle or ignore circular references while using System.Text.Json to serialize and deserialize JSON in .NET.
- [Serialize polymorphic types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json/polymorphism.md): Learn how to serialize polymorphic objects while serializing to and deserializing from JSON in .NET.
- [Use extension methods on HttpClient](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json/httpclient-extensions.md): Learn how to serialize and deserialize JSON payloads from the network in a single line of code using extension methods on HttpClient and HttpContent.

## JSON serialization

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json/overview.md): This overview describes the System.Text.Json namespace functionality for serializing to and deserializing from JSON in .NET.
- [Visual Basic support](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json/visual-basic-support.md): Learn which parts of the System.Text.Json namespace aren't supported in Visual Basic.
- [Supported types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json/supported-types.md): Learn which types are supported for serialization by the APIs in the System.Text.Json namespace.

## Read/write JSON without using JsonSerializer

- [Use DOM](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json/use-dom.md): Learn how to use a JSON document object model (DOM).
- [Use Utf8JsonWriter](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json/use-utf8jsonwriter.md): Learn how to use Utf8JsonWriter.
- [Use Utf8JsonReader](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json/use-utf8jsonreader.md): Learn how to use Utf8JsonReader.

## Serialize

- [How to serialize](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json/how-to.md): Learn how to use the System.Text.Json namespace to serialize to JSON in .NET. Includes sample code.
- [Customize property names and values](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json/customize-properties.md): Learn how to customize property names and values when serializing with System.Text.Json in .NET.
- [Ignore properties](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json/ignore-properties.md): Learn how to ignore properties when serializing with System.Text.Json in .NET.
- [Include fields](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json/fields.md): Learn how to include fields when you serialize to and deserialize from JSON in .NET.
